body:
Hi German,
You need to have a space between O and 1, like this:  -O 1.
It used to be without a space, but I guess it was changed when it got added
to Radiance.
A segfault is not a good thing regardless, so we should probably do
something to avoid the segfault from mis-use.
Andy
___
